austin1.description: Denise (top) threw Austin (bottom) a suprise birthday party.
austin1.title: Austin 1

austin2.description: The well wishers, left to right:  Julie, Lucie, Craig, Dean, Jen, William, Austin, Felix, Denise.
austin2.title: Austin 2

austin3.description: Felix helped with a lot of the cooking, and put the candles in the cake.
austin3.title: Austin 3

darthvader.description: Felix likes to play both the nice and evil sides of Star Wars.  He told his teacher to call him Luke Skywalker.  He says school is Jedi school, where he learns to use the Force with his Jedi friends.  But he also likes to dress up as Darth Vader.  Even more, he likes to pretend to be Darth Vader's kitty cat. Darth Vader's kitty cat is bad and likes to scratch, just like Keenan's cat -- but Darth Vader loves his kitty the way he is.  Felix explains: "bad people think that bad things are good".
darthvader.title: Darthvader

jordan.description: This little girl is Jordan.  Milo's nanny Maria just starting keeping her two days a week.  She lives two blocks away.
jordan.title: Jordan

peekaboo1.description: When Milo isn't destroying things, he's earning his keep as Mr. Cuteness and Light.  Here he plays peekaboo along with the Teletubbies.   Also, he started quite often pretending to be a dog needing to be petted, with the cutest little woof! woof!
peekaboo1.title: Peekaboo 1

peekaboo2.description: By the way, TV is now "Tee", and "Po" means specifically the Teletubbies.
peekaboo2.title: Peekaboo 2

tree1.description: Dean attempts to convey that ornaments go ON the tree and don't come back OFF.
tree1.title: Tree 1

tree2.description: The guy at the tree lot was super nice.  He made this tree just for Felix and Baby Dog.
tree2.title: Tree 2

tree4.description: The star goes on last, of course.
tree4.title: Tree 4

tree5.description: As soon as the star went up,  Felix posted several Star Wars characters in the branches to guard against those who might attempt to purloin our pine.
tree5.title: Tree 5

tree7.description: Papa John made Ruf a long time ago.  Ruf goes at the very bottom of the tree, because he jumps down at night to drink water from the tree stand.
tree7.title: Tree 7

description:
Milo's been eviscerating popup books and destroying toys at an alarming rate. He even managed to break a toy hammer, just by using it as intended. It isn't mean-spirited or angry, just... vigorously inquisitive. This behavior has taken us by surprise: Felix has always been gentle and respectful. The good news is that Milo does, sometimes, show self-restraint. We put up the Christmas tree this week and after a few very firm no's, he is staying away.

Felix had his 4 year old check-up. All systems go. 41 in/104 cm, 39.5 lbs/18 kg.

Felix is showing an interest in reading. We have been enthusiastically playing letter games with him; he's gratifyingly engaged, with encouraging results. He is not yet interested in the writing part of it.
title: December 18
